attributionInfo.agentName: Jennie & Eddie Luxury Living Boston Team

description: This completely renovated 3 bedroom brick and beam loft is unmatched. Rarely seen in downtown 'lofts', each of the bedrooms is separate for privacy and functionality; satisfying that common need for a guestroom, nursery in addition to a large office. Dark walnut Chevron floors meet you as you open the front door and extend throughout the entire living space. The ceiling heights, oversized windows and matte brick accent walls give this home a charming and sophisticated feel. The centerpiece is a massive kitchen island which is perfect for entertaining and casual dining. Both baths have been tastefully renovated. The association has an elevator for easy access, package area and private extra storage. Live only blocks from the hottest neighborhood in Boston with Trader Joe's, Cisco Beer Garden, F1 Racing, Puttshack, the Institute of Contemporary Art and the Harborwalk. Just outside the association's front door is Martin's Park with climate resilient, children's play structures.

telephoneConsumerProtectionActDisclaimer.text: By pressing Contact agent, you agree that Zillow Group and its affiliates, and real estate professionals may call/text you about your inquiry, which may involve use of automated means and prerecorded/artificial voices. You don’t need to consent as a condition of buying any property, goods or services. Message/data rates may apply. You also agree to our Terms of Use. Zillow does not endorse any real estate professionals. We may share information about your recent and future site activity with your agent to help them understand what you’re looking for in a home.

textAttributes.tooltipText: “Real estate professionals” includes the real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders and loan officers, property managers, and other professionals you interact with through Zillow.
